sessionCookie.title: Instagram Session Cookie (sessionid)
sessionCookie.description: Your Instagram session cookie (sessionid). Get it from browser DevTools > Application > Cookies > instagram.com > sessionid

usersToFollow.title: Users to Follow
usersToFollow.description: List of Instagram usernames to follow

maxFollowsPerRun.title: Max Follows Per Run
maxFollowsPerRun.description: Maximum number of accounts to follow in this run (recommended: 10-40 depending on account age)

delayBetweenFollows.title: Delay Between Follows (seconds)
delayBetweenFollows.description: Time to wait between each follow action (recommended: 30-60 seconds)

randomDelayVariation.title: Random Delay Variation (seconds)
randomDelayVariation.description: Random variation added to delay (Â±seconds) to make activity look more human

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Type of your Instagram account (affects daily limits)

useCleanedInput.title: Use Cleaned Input from Previous Run
useCleanedInput.description: If enabled, automatically uses the cleaned input from the previous run (removes already followed accounts). Make sure to run at least once first!

scrapFromProfile.title: Scrape Followers from Profile (Optional)
scrapFromProfile.description: Instagram username to scrape followers from (e.g., 'instagram'). Leave empty to skip. The actor will follow followers from this profile.

scrapFromPost.title: Scrape Likers from Post (Optional)
scrapFromPost.description: Instagram post URL to scrape likers from (e.g., 'https://www.instagram.com/p/ABC123/'). Leave empty to skip. The actor will follow accounts that liked this post.

maxScrapesToFollow.title: Max Accounts to Scrape
maxScrapesToFollow.description: Maximum number of followers/likers to scrape and follow (used only if scraping is enabled)
